attributes.action: Make the new National Anthem "Blame It On The Boogie"
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned think that "Blame It On The Boogie" is a better National Anthem than the current one, especially in these depressing times.  I also call on the PM and the Cabinet to do the dance.  Think of the national morale in these straightened times.  It will also add 50% to GDP.
